metadata.title: BluShark 3-Ring Single Pass Zulu-style Nylon Watch Band Multiple Sizes and Colors
features: BluShark high-grade ballistic nylon construction cleanly stitched around the buckles
description: Our 3-Ring collection is constructed from a very soft and pliable nylon weave and is adorned with 3 stainless steel rings. The straps are single-pass straps meaning they do not have the "second flap" that can be found in our Alpha, Orca, and Original collections. Our 3-Ring straps are unique in that a straight line is weaved down the middle of the strap providing a subtle pop of flair. Though they are 1.4mm thick, these straps are some of the softest and most pliable in our collection. - WHY CHOOSE BluShark?: The BluShark name is synonymous with an incomparable level of high quality. The 5-star ratings across our product line speak for themselves. An innovator in the field, BluShark offers product lines tailored to the preferences of the watch community including the Original BluShark collection, Orca thick straps, Cordura, Canvas, and Silicone watch bands. BluShark was the first US company to offer a luxury nylon strap, the AlphaShark. BluShark LIFETIME GUARANTEE: BluShark's soft, but strong premium grade nylon is our trademark. BluShark guarantees the quality of any watch strap sold by BluShark for the life of the product. We will replace any product purchased from us that is shown to have a manufacturer's defect. - LENGTH: 280mm (11in.)
